methods.javadoc:
Returns the length, in bytes, of the signature.
@return the length, in bytes, of the signature
methods.name: getLength
methods.comment: Returns the length, in bytes, of the signature.

return.comment: the length, in bytes, of the signature

methods.javadoc:
Returns the certificate revision. Currently, 
 the only defined certificate revision is 
 WIN_CERT_REVISION_1_0 (0x0100).
@return the certificate revision
methods.name: getRevision
methods.comment:
Returns the certificate revision. Currently, 
 the only defined certificate revision is 
 WIN_CERT_REVISION_1_0 (0x0100).

methods.javadoc:
Returns the certificate type.
@return the certificate type
methods.name: getType

methods.javadoc:
Returns a string representation of the certificate type.
@return a string representation of the certificate type
methods.name: getTypeAsString
methods.comment: Returns a string representation of the certificate type.

return.comment: a string representation of the certificate type

methods.name: getData
methods.comment:
An array of certificates. The format of this member 
 depends on the value of wCertificateType.

name: SecurityCertificate
